Gesper: Okay, I will tell you, even if it may seem somehow alien to 
you. We are, after all, derived from predacon philosophies.
We seek to give the power of the Matrix to every Transformers, with or 
without violence. We have adopted reformatting to enable some of us to 
be in constant contact with the Matrix. We venerate it, as it is the 
source of most of our knowledge and our strenght. As a faction, we 
consider that loyalty to comrades is a quality and a value that is 
important for good military life. As for me... I completed studies at 
the Tripredacus War Academy. I am qualified as a warrior and 
specialized in tactics and strategy. My brother Belthassan and my 
sister Melchana are the rest of the original mission that came here. 
Together, we form Prophetus, the techno-organic Gestalt. Everything 
that I am telling you now was classified, but Daemos, the new 
commander, ordered me to reveal those informations to you.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Pacifix then accelerates, and hits the water with a loud splash. His
> voice then resonates in the transport room that Gesper occupies. "So
> then Gesper, tell me about you and your people." He asked as he 
began to
> submerge, his internal insturments adapting, to keep moisture out, 
yet
> keep Gesper's room compfortable.
